Posts.Content: Hi all, I'm due to have my 2nd chemo on Tuesday but I have thrombophlebitis from my first chemo which is still quite sore. Has anyone else had this?Â  Kathryn xxx

Posts.Content: Hi Betty, I'm not sure that it will clear up for Tuesday, I'm crossing everything that next treatment goes ahead at the moment. I'm very tempted to ask about a PICC line as they really struggled to find my veins last time. Have they delayed your chemo by much? Kathryn xxx
